data.title: Mark McGowan urges Rio Tinto to relocate head office from London to Perth
data.meta_description: Mark McGowan has urged Rio Tinto to relocate its head office from London to Perth, saying the move made sense given the lion’s share of the company’s profits came from WA.
data.text:
Mark McGowan has urged Rio Tinto to relocate its head office from London to Perth, saying the move made sense given the lion’s share of the company’s profits came from WA.

“We are pleased to have worked with Rio Tinto to move its interstate FIFO workforce to WA,” Mr McGowan said. “It’s only natural their corporate headquarters should move here as well.
